1  European Summer Tour – Day 3 (2025-06-15)  
2  Location: Roma, Italia  
3  
4  Morning:  
5    • Private Colosseum tour at 8:30 AM.  
6    • Explore Roman Forum and Palatine Hill.  
7  
8  Lunch:  
9    • Trattoria da Enzo – try carciofi alla giudia.  
10  
11 Afternoon:  
12   • Panthéon visit (advance tickets).  
13   • Authentic gelato at Fatamorgana.  
14  
15 Evening:  
16   • Aperitivo in Trastevere; dinner at Da Felice.  
17   • Sunset walk by Ponte Sisto.  
18  
19 Hotel: Relais Palatino  
20   • Check-in from 1 PM; complimentary Wi-Fi & breakfast.
